name: Frankenstorm
description:
Made in only 48 hours for Ludum Dare 39, Theme: Running Out of Power

Click here to view the game page!

Your creator wants to make more monsters, but, alas, the weather is not cooperating.

MAKE IT

Combat clouds and capture them into the Box of Torment to power your evil creator’s experiments.

Of course, normally good old thunderstorms will do the trick, but there have been very slim pickings recently.

Controls

Use left and right to move, and up to jump.

Hold Z down to fire, and release it to capture stunned clouds.

Dangers

Do not get hit by electricity or electrified water! You have infinite lives, but try to get the fewest deaths possible.

Have fun!
